Ptolemy I wins!
All Provinces are gone.

cards in supply: Bridge, Conspirator, Duchess, Duke, Mine, Mint, Rabble, Shanty Town, Talisman, and Vault

----------------------

#1 Ptolemy I: 39 points (5 Provinces, 2 Duchies, and 3 Estates); 18 turns
           opening: Shanty Town / Talisman
           [43 cards] 10 Conspirators, 7 Shanty Towns, 4 Bridges, 4 Rabbles, 1 Talisman, 7 Coppers, 3 Estates, 2 Duchies, 5 Provinces

#2 SpakKadi: 25 points (3 Provinces, 4 Estates, and a Duchy); 18 turns
          opening: Bridge / Shanty Town
          [28 cards] 3 Bridges, 3 Shanty Towns, 1 Mine, 1 Vault, 4 Coppers, 5 Silvers, 3 Golds, 4 Estates, 1 Duchy, 3 Provinces

----------------------

trash: a Silver and 3 Coppers


Game log

Turn order is SpakKadi and then Ptolemy I.

The 12 chosen cards are Bridge, Conspirator, Duchess, Duke, Ill-Gotten Gains, Mine, Mint, Rabble, Shanty Town, Swindler, Talisman, and Vault.
SpakKadi vetoes Ill-Gotten Gains.
Ptolemy I vetoes Swindler.
(SpakKadi's first hand: an Estate and 4 Coppers.)
(Ptolemy I's first hand: 2 Estates and 3 Coppers.)


— SpakKadi's turn 1 —
SpakKadi plays 4 Coppers.
SpakKadi buys a Bridge.
(SpakKadi draws: 2 Estates and 3 Coppers.)

   Ptolemy I plays 3 Coppers.
   Ptolemy I buys a Shanty Town.
